name: Sorin
description:
"be softer with you.

you are a breathing thing.

a memory to someone.

a home to a life"

-nayyirah waheed

Sorin awakens in a completely different world, without his memories of how he got here and without his soul crystals.

Help Sorin find his way home through the labyrinth of the new world.

But be careful what lurks in the dark...

Controls:

 Move

                                          

Jump

                                       

Look
